quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Time and Day
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, steve. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the series One Day At A Time, Ann Romano and her daughters lived in what city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Indianapolis, IN

questions.question: In the 1981-1982 season of One Day at a Time, Ann Romano goes into business with her nemesis, Francine Webster, who was played by what actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shelley Fabares

questions.question: What actor played Jake Hanson on TV series Melrose Place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grant Show

questions.question: On TV series Melrose Place,  what actress played the character of Amanda Woodward?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heather Locklear

questions.question: Which character served as Steve Austins superior in 1974s Friday night show The Six Million Dollar Man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oscar Goldman

questions.question: In the long-running sitcom One Day at a Time, Ann Romano had two daughters. What were their names?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Julie and Barbara

questions.question: Ann Romanos fiance, Nick Handris, was killed by a drunk driver, before they were married on the show One Day at a Time.
What year did One Day at a Time first air on the CBS network?

What was the first name of superintendent Schneider, a character on the hit show One Day at a Time, played by Pat Harrington?
In the 1980-1981 season of One Day at a Time, Ann Romano was engaged to a man named Nick Handris, who had a son. Who played Nicks son, Alex?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Glenn Scarpelli

questions.question: This 1978 Friday night program began with the narration:  Mr. McGee, dont make me angry. You wouldnt like me when Im angry.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Incredible Hulk

questions.question: In 1969, The Brady Bunch aired at 8:00 on Fridays.  Which Brady was played by actor Mike Lookinland?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bobby Brady

questions.question: What year did the hit show One Day at a Time go off the air?
In the 1981-1982 season of One Day at a Time, Ann Romano finally marries Sam Royer. How were they related before they married?

options.text: He was her first husbands brother

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was Barbaras father-in-law

questions.question: Why does FDR wish Kramer dead on the sitcom Seinfeld?

options.text: Kramer hit him with a snowball.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kramer hit him with a snowball.

questions.question: Why is Kramer referred to as Kessler in the original episode of the show Seinfeld?

options.text: It was the name of one of Larry Charles neighbors.
Kenny Kramer had not yet given his consent to the creators of the show to use his name.
It was just selected at random.
They thought the name was funnier.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kenny Kramer had not yet given his consent to the creators of the show to use his name.

questions.question: Which actress portrayed Cosmos mother, Babs Kramer, on Seinfeld?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sheree North

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mickey Mantle and Bette Midler

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Maestro
